Class LayerLoader

Direct Known Subclasses:
ARCIMSLayerLoader, LinkLoader, PostgisLayerLoader, WCSLayerLoader, WFSLayerLoader, WMSLayerLoader
public abstract class LayerLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This class has to be inherited by all the classes that have to load a layer in the current view
